author: Shawn Hogan
comment: Many good features about this app Such as awesome stock faces and cool customization,  but the weather is very inaccurate. Living in San Diego   I am fairly certain it's not going to rain for the next 3 weeks straight,  and it's not 82° at 8pm in February.  Inaccurate weather can be a deal breaker for most smart watch owners.  Fix the weather problem and I give 5 stars.
title: Almost

author: Sherry Corbett
comment: The weather  currently displays 77°F. It is 10°F here. Obviously wrong. Isn't the app able to use phone location? I am uninstalling until fixed. May have to cancel my subscription as well.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear sherry, new faces like Lucky Mouse , Galaxy, Minimal they all have 12-24 modes, Please have a try and let us know if you have any question. Really appreciate it !

title: Please fix the weather

author: Eric Kaiser
comment: But there's no access to settings, the weather didn't appear to work, and the G+ community appears to have been abandoned
title: They're nice

author: Andrew Bartal
comment: Great and simple watch faces. I'd love to give it 5 stars, but a lot of the really neat faces are only available in 24 hour mode with no ability to toggle it to 12 hour.

author: Aron Deppert
comment: ...weather reports as 82 degrees every day. I live in Illinois, so this is quite impossible in March!
title: Awesome faces to choose from, but...

author: Kalpit Dabholkar
comment: All the watch faces are for round wears and nothing for square face. Although its applicable to square but it will be better if you provide settings to choose between square and round.
title: No Square watch face faces

author: Beth Bosley
comment: As others have said, there are nice options here. Weather is WRONG. Easy to use.
title: Nice options, poor weather

author: Kit F
comment: Nice faces, you claim to be closely working with Mobvoi but no support for Ticwatch?? Please add support and I'll rate 5 stars!
title: Nice, but...

author: Richard Mordew
comment: Weather is way out, days are wrong & all screens are for round watches.
title: Mangla Media

author: Teo Rohan
comment: I like the watch faces. Very cool and innovative. But the displayed weather conditions are wrong.
title: Great watch faces

author: Arlene Luciano
comment: Love the watchfaces but like a lot of other people here the weather doesn't even show up on my Huawei watch. Please fix it!
title: Like it

author: Cindy H
comment: Installed and it just gives errors. "Data load failed. Please try again later."

author: Christopher Herbert
comment: No battery drain issues, attractive while easy to read and useful indicators. With greater customizations a 5/5
title: Great watch face

comment: But weather bug is very annoying...
title: NICE WATCH FACES !

comment: Nothing appeared in my Android Wear App after installation.
title: I can't find any watch faces

comment: So many faces with large graphics of useful options.

comment: I can imagine the effort put into developing these beautiful faces and for free
title: Love it

comment: Wrong weather info...

title: Not installing on Android

comment: I like it.

author: Song Chee Chong
comment: Is good to have more watch face

comment: The app is not loading now..
title: Nice

author: Dan Altschul
comment: Great designs

author: Satheesh S
comment: Simply Awesome

author: Jorge Mateo
comment: Awesome

author: Vito Sans
comment: Okay, this app doesn't have its own app for configuration management, its in the android wear app. So far I like the faces and the apps, they are clean and different then others. I don't get any data, my step counter doesn't work and the weather feed doesn't update. Don't know about battery drain yet as I have not had it on for long as the data doesn't load so I can use it for much. Looking forward to it getting fixed. Will revisit review once issues are worked out.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Vito, Weather info needs to take about 2-3 mins to be synced up. Just make sure turn on your 3-4G network and GPS. Step info is from watch own counter.Walking about couple of mins you will see steps are changed. Coming version will support google fit and weather. Please let us know if you still have any question.ThX and Merry Christmas:)﻿

title: Cool, but...

author: Cristian Garjy
comment: All watch faces show the wrong weather and I can't set location or anything

author: james
comment: Even though I not using a watch face set by this app, it is running in the background?
title: Not bad but..

author: Darlene Hull
comment: I am looking for the add your own photo option listed in the updates. Where is that on the actual watch faces?

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Darlene , on your phone side in magic watch face. on face C9 ultra page you could find the "setting" button ,and tap it . You will be able to see the option then.

title: Looks amazing and easy to use.

author: Francisco Ortiz
comment: PLAY store says it installed but no icon and it won't launch from the appstore installation

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Francisco. Actually, Magic watch face App is in Android Wear on your phone.  Thanks :)

title: Won't open

author: Gerhard Cronje
comment: Such a pleasure to get such an awesome gift. Beautiful faces, free for Christmas. Thanks guys, merry Christmas!
title: Brilliant

author: Thye Chean Lim
comment: I don't understand - such a beautiful watch face, why is it free?

author: Liam O'Rourke
comment: Loving the C9

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Thanks for supporting Magic Watchface, we'll make more great watch faces in the future

title: Great designs

author: paul richman
comment: Beautiful watch face but it will not load from my stock T-mobile Note5 to my new Tag Heuer Connected watch.  I've tried everything  to make this work. Restarted both my watch and my Note5.  Uninstalled and reinstalled.  Nothing works, unfortunately.  The developer was sympathetic but unable to solve the problem.  This happened on several other of their lovely watch faces.  Only "Ticker" worked.  Note that most watch faces I have tried have downloaded with no problems.

author: Richard Frank
comment: Quite an expensive app, but I like the watch-faces. Nice selection, and quite professionally done. However, why is it communicating with about 20 IP addresses? I can see the requests,  to all sorts of IPs and ports, so it's chattering on the Internet.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Dear Richard:
 Really sorry for this kind of inconvenience. We checked the our server and found the reason fixed  it , Please kindly re-try it. Let's us know if you have any question about it!
Really appreciate it !

comment: Always get error message saying try again, but it never works.

reply.content:
Dear Rupert, 
 Really sorry for this kind of inconvenience. We checked the our server and found the reason fixed  it , Please kindly re-try it. Let's us know if you have any question about it!
Really appreciate it !

title: Data won't load; not on wifi or cellular

reply.content: Dear Richard, new faces like Lucky Mouse , Galaxy, Minimal (updated) they all have 12-24 modes, Please have a try and let us know if you have any question. Really appreciate it !
